Text: Justice can’t just be equal - it must also be equitable.
We must control the natural impulses that will make us bad members of society.
We need kindness, not divisive rhetoric.
Diversity is a feature, not a bug.
Our greatest thinkers have always agreed that survival of the fittest is the law of the universe.
The importance of hard work should be instilled from a young age.
Education is our only defense against brainwashing.
Happiness is found in social relationships, not in material wealth.
